meta.title: Live the Life
meta.description: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn't take.

quote.title: Sleep
lines: "Sleep is that golden chain that ties health and our bodies together."
- Thomas Dekker

quote.title: Nature
lines: "Nature holds the key to our aesthetic, intellectual, cognitive and even spiritual satisfaction."
- E. O. Wilson

quote.title: Sky
lines: "The sky is an infinite movie to me. I never get tired of looking at what's happening up there."
- K. D. Lang

quote.title: Smile
lines: "The greatest self is a peaceful smile, that always sees the world smiling back."
- Bryant H. McGill

quote.title: Love
lines: "There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved."
- George Sand

quote.title: Photos
lines: "I do not see my family life in any way, shape, or form as an opportunity for a photo."
- Shania Twain

quote.title: Health
lines: "Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship."
- Buddha

quote.title: Books
lines: "Reading is a conversation. All books talk. But a good book listens as well."
- Mark Haddon

quote.title: Music
lines: "One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain."
- Bob Marley

quote.title: Play
lines: "In every real man a child is hidden that wants to play."
- Friedrich Nietzsche

quote.title: Travel
lines: "The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page."
- Thomas Jefferson

quote.title: Quotes
lines: "A fine quotation is a diamond in the hand of a man of wit and a pebble in the hand of a fool."
- Joseph Roux
